DOC.detailed_description: Background Life style related disease increase problem world . The Metabolic Syndrome ( MetS ) condition characterize abdominal obesity , dyslipidemia , hypertension impair glucose tolerance . Subjects MetS high risk develop Type 2 Diabetes CVD . Resistant Starch ( RS ) Arabinoxylans ( AX ) dietary fiber show positive effect component MetS . The combination RS AX test . Hypotheses Increase RS AX dietary composition positive effect component MetS i.e . decrease postprandial lipaemia , improve glucose tolerance , insulin resistance , blood pressure marker inflammation . Design : A nonblinded randomize cross study Two dietary intervention 4 week duration . A healthy carbohydrate Diet high content RS AX compare Western Style diet low content RS AX . Between two intervention , wash period 4 week . The primary outcome postprandial lipaemia estimate high fat meal test 6 hour duration . The test perform intervention . Secondary outcome : - Glucose tolerance insulin resistance estimate OGTT - 24 hour blood pressure - MRI estimation liver fat content - Postprandial change gene adipose tissue
